short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeping up with Kanye West is like shoveling snow in a blizzard...there's absolutely no point.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kanye Kardashian is the coolest extension ever!! Let Kanye West know exactly how the world views him. Not as an 'choke..cough cough...' artist, but as an evil little troll that lives in his wife's shadow. This extension changes Kanye West to Kanye Kardashian!
